message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. Use either the scope attribute on th elements, or the headers attribute on td elements.
Semantic markup should be used to mark emphasised or special text so that it can be programmatically determined.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
selector: #footer > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > p:nth-child(1) > a
